title: Call_Me_Guru
author: Call_Me_Guru
content: Lately I noticed my posted images via https://imgur.com are reading something else like "bitcointalk image proxy invalid image." The first thing that came to my mind was that the image has been corrupted somehow but was lucky to see other topic's images displaying same and similar errors. The most important post and service aspects of the forum was not left out.I was able to use another URL to upload another image yesterday and the image is still there as I write.Since I can't find anyone talking about it, I am curious as a new member to know what is happening on https://imgur.com. There must be a reason for an image uploading site to just be disabled and the alternatives were left alone.Good opinions will be appreciated.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.created_time: May 14, 2023, 01:17:05 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 01:29:37 PM by Nwada001
comments.body: The issue I noticed it about a week ago, and a lot of forum members have been complaining about it here on the forum, and a user has also created a thread regarding the issue.  Imgur images suddenly became invalid.  There have also been alternative suggestions to the imgur issue, and joker_josue created a specific design for Bitcointalk users to avoid this kind of imgur issue in the future . TalkImg.com: Image Hosting for BitcoinTalk  Edit: Today, a new progress was also launched by TryNinja . [Script] Imgur to TalkImg: automatically fix your broken images  The issue of Imgur is no longer something new here on the forum, and very soon all those whose post images are affected will have them fixed up again, and those old posts will go back to normal again.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Imgur is on a mission to destroy itself  . What happened exactly I do not know but if you input the url on Google you will find the mess. Earlier we used to visit the url imgur.com. At the moment if you enter the same url on Google it gets redirected to imgur.io. They might have accidentally forgotten that the links they gave for sharing the images do not automatically get forwarded to the .io domain.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Call_Me_Guru on May 14, 2023, 01:15:03 PMLately I noticed my posted images via https://imgur.com are reading something else like "bitcointalk image proxy invalid image." How did you experience this error when you don't have the Copper Membership and newbies can't post images because of the restrictions of that rank Is this your alt account buddy ??

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on May 14, 2023, 01:49:05 PMQuote from: Call_Me_Guru on May 14, 2023, 01:15:03 PMLately I noticed my posted images via https://imgur.com are reading something else like "bitcointalk image proxy invalid image." How did you experience this error when you don't have the Copper Membership and newbies can't post images because of the restrictions of that rank Is this your alt account buddy ??The OP said reading posted," which could probably mean that the OP is reading through old threads from other members and not threads created by the OP. Anyone, at any rank, can see posts that have images on them very clearly; they are only restricted from posting images but not from viewing posts with images.Quote from: Call_Me_Guru on May 14, 2023, 01:15:03 PMI was able to use another URL to upload another image yesterday and the image is still there as I write.But if you are to justify the OP's above statement, it is clear that the OP either doesn't know what he or she is saying, or the OP has other accounts here in the forum, or maybe the OP might have ranked up before and then deleted all the posts and activities, which can also reduce the OP's rank.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Orpichukwu on May 14, 2023, 02:03:33 PMQuote from: Woodie on May 14, 2023, 01:49:05 PMQuote from: Call_Me_Guru on May 14, 2023, 01:15:03 PMLately I noticed my posted images via https://imgur.com are reading something else like "bitcointalk image proxy invalid image." How did you experience this error when you don't have the Copper Membership and newbies can't post images because of the restrictions of that rank Is this your alt account buddy ??The OP said reading posted," which could probably mean that the OP is reading through old threads from other members and not threads created by the OP. Anyone, at any rank, can see posts that have images on them very clearly; they are only restricted from posting images but not from viewing posts with images.How does reading "my posted posts" and "similar errors" change to reading through old threads from other members ? Read the first sentence, it's all there...Btw you expect such posts from people that know whats expected when you post images regularly and the alike not from someone that has never posted an image in the first place, just my 2cents.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Call_Me_Guru on May 14, 2023, 01:15:03 PMSince I can't find anyone talking about it, I am curious as a new member to know what is happening on https://imgur.com. There must be a reason for an image uploading site to just be disabled and the alternatives were left alone.Imgur images suddenly became invalid?OP, is your vision okay?Do not expand the discussion, close the topic.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: It is probably imgur related error so just use some alternatives such as imgbb.com which i usually using and the new one made a community member, the talkimg.com[1].[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450546.0
